task.en: Mark the zip file in this folder with tags blue and red.
task.zh: 把当前文件夹下的zip压缩包用红蓝两色标签标出来。
task.ar: قم بوضع علامات زرقاء وحمراء على ملف zip الموجود في هذا المجلد.
task.ja: 現在のフォルダ内のzipファイルに青色と赤色のタグを付けてください。
task.ru: Пометьте ZIP-файл в этой папке тегами синим и красным.

pre_command: open /Users/ec2-user/Desktop; osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to close windows' && rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents && open /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped
grading_command: mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Blue" && mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Red" && ! mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Orange" && ! mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Yellow" && ! mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Green" && ! mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Purple" && ! mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Gray" && echo "True" || echo "False"

mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Blue" && mdls -name kMDItemUserTags /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Zipped/unzipped_contents.zip 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Red" && echo "True" || echo "False"
